title.narrative: Provision of settlement NFIs and emergency sanitation to flood-affected host community populations i

description.narrative: The objective of the project is to provide settlement Non-Food Items as well as to provide emergency shared latrines and organize community awareness activities on water-borne diseases to 2000 flood affected vulnerable host community households in Al Jabalain locality, White Nile state to save their lives and restore their dignity, CAFOD, in partnership with Global Aid Hand (as the local co-implementing agency) and in coordination with Shelter and NFIs sector lead (both at Kosti and Khartoum levels), other actors and the affected population, will respond to the settlement NFI needs of 2,000 flood affected host community households in Al Jabalain locality, White Nile State, by providing them with settlement Non-Food Items. The settlement Non-Food Items to be provided to the selected beneficiaries will be - 2 Jerry-can (20-litres capacity), 2 blankets, 2 plastic sheets, 2 sleeping mats, 1 ibrik and 1 set of HH utensils. - And provision of hand-washing soaps for personal hygiene
